alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 26 at 2:23AM MST until July 26 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Arizona, north central Arizona, northeast Arizona and west central Arizona, including the following areas, Yavapai, Coconino, northern Gila, southern Navajo, and southern Apache counties. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flash flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, swimming holes, slot canyons, and over recently burned areas. Low-water crossings could also experience flash flooding, which would create deadly travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Deep monsoonal moisture will result in widespread showers and thunderstorms with an increased risk for heavy rainfall, which may lead to flash flooding. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. Stay out of slot canyons.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains
